messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Struggles
messages.msgSnippet: What about her writing in a journal or writing her feelings or letter to you?  I used a journal alot when I was a teenager. Ann
messages.messageBody:
What about her writing in a journal or writing her feelings or letter to
you? I used a journal alot when I was a teenager.
Ann

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Struggles
messages.msgSnippet: I don t think she is aware of it. She was never one to articulate deep down feelings to me or anyone else. I think that will in itself come to light in time.
messages.messageBody:
I don't think she is aware of it. She was never one to articulate deep down feelings to me or anyone else. I think that will in itself come to light in time.
Jessica
 
Vaughnde Lee
Missoula, Montana
http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com
-----Original Message-----
From: Diana Tashjian <diana@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Monday, March 26, 2001 12:20 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Struggles

Was Naomi able to explain or articulate what's bothering her?
 
Wishing you the best,
Diana Tashjian
----- Original Message -----
From: Vaughnde Edwards
To: unschooling
Sent: Monday, March 26, 2001 9:19 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Struggles

We have been struggling these last two weeks. Naomi has been watching far too much television, not doing much reading or study work. Her attitudes towards me and others has degenerated into surly and mean and disrespectful.
 
We had a family pow-wow last night and discussed all this. Decided to limit television watching to one hour a day, computer to one hour a day, spend more time reading God's word, prayer, reading the books from the library, do more science experiments, etc. We will also be moving within the next month...at least by May 1st we should be in a different apartment than this one. And as a part of the move cable will be shut off and not reinstated for a looooooooong time. (unspecified time limit) I would appreciate your support and prayers in this.
 
Jessica
 
Vaughnde Lee
Missoula, Montana
http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com

We have been struggling these last two weeks. Naomi has been watching far too much television, not doing much reading or study work. Her attitudes towards me and others has degenerated into surly and mean and disrespectful.
 
We had a family pow-wow last night and discussed all this. Decided to limit television watching to one hour a day, computer to one hour a day, spend more time reading God's word, prayer, reading the books from the library, do more science experiments, etc. We will also be moving within the next month...at least by May 1st we should be in a different apartment than this one. And as a part of the move cable will be shut off and not reinstated for a looooooooong time. (unspecified time limit) I would appreciate your support and prayers in this.
